title:
Classification of stationary solutions of the $(4 + 1)$-dimensional
  radial Yang-Mills equation
abstract:
We classify the solutions of the planar weighted Allen-Cahn equation arising
from the critical equivariant $SO(4)$ Yang-Mills problem. We first give a
complete classification for radially symmetric solutions, and then without
symmetry assumptions, we show bounded classical solutions are radially
symmetric and also classify them.
